RelatedSentence: PESHAWAR - Armed gunmen shot dead a traffic warden on duty today and escaped the scene .
PESHAWAR - Armed gunmen shot dead a traffic warden on duty today and escaped the scene .
Unknown gunmen opened fire at Sub-Inspector traffic police identified as Muslim Khan deployed at Kohat Road in Maripur police station jurisdiction leaving him critically injured .
Unknown gunmen opened fire at Sub-Inspector traffic police identified as Muslim Khan deployed at Kohat Road in Maripur police station jurisdiction leaving him critically injured .
The injured cop was shifted to Lady Reading Hospital ( LRH ) where he succumbed to his wounds .
Police have registered a case against unknown murderers and started investigation .
